title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: West Elk Mountains, Colorado
content:
Photo submitted by Jason Schroeder, “Top of Trail 401 outside Crested Butte, CO. Doesn’t get much better than late summer in the West Elks!” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: West Elk Mountains, Colorado appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
